name: Manik Miah
short_bio: Manik Miah, the head culinary specialist from the Windsor Tiffin eatery in Burbage, contributed in the finals of the Curry Chef of the Year competition sorted out by the Bangladesh Caterers Association. He is now considered at the seventh most talented chef among top famous ten chefs in Bangladesh.

name: Kabir
